hero.title: Welcome to Elia Boutique Pilates Studio
hero.subtitle: The art of movement, strength, and balance. Discover your full potential through our guided Pilates sessions.

about.title: About Our Studio
about.description: Elia Pilates Studio is a space dedicated to health, balance, and strength. Our training sessions combine modern techniques with a calming environment, helping each client experience complete physical and mental well-being.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have a question? Reach out to us directly via WhatsApp.

video.title: Watch Our Training Session
video.fallback: Your browser does not support the video tag.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.membership_note: The monthly membership is valid for 30 days from the day of payment.
pricing.transfer_note: No other person can use your membership.
